citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_f8bd7be3-d4e5-4775-85e9-30dc7e9ae126\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"arnault\", \"family\": \"le bris\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2023\", \"09\", \"22\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ce jeu de donn\u00e9es contient des rasters de la distribution de zost\u00e8re \u00e0 trois sites (Swift Current, North Harbour et Bay de L'Eau) dans la baie de Plaisance, \u00e0 Terre-Neuve. Ces donn\u00e9es ont \u00e9t\u00e9 recueilli \u00e0 l'\u00e9t\u00e9 et \u00e0 l'automne 2020 et publi\u00e9 en 2023. Les shapefiles ont \u00e9t\u00e9 cr\u00e9\u00e9s en utilisant la proc\u00e9dure d\u00e9taill\u00e9e dans Prystay et all. 2013 : 10.1139/facettes-2022-0149. Les images a\u00e9riennes des herbiers de zost\u00e8res ont \u00e9t\u00e9 recueillies \u00e0 l'aide d'un drone et d'un plan de relev\u00e9 syst\u00e9matique. Les images ont ensuite \u00e9t\u00e9 combin\u00e9es pour cr\u00e9er des orthomosa\u00efques. Enfin, les orthomosa\u00efques ont \u00e9t\u00e9 analys\u00e9es \u00e0 l'aide d'une m\u00e9thode de classification automatique pour distinguer la zost\u00e8re marine des autres types de substrat (s\u00e9diments, algues). La classification a \u00e9t\u00e9 inform\u00e9e et valid\u00e9e \u00e0 l'aide de points de validation. Il est important de comprendre que les raster sont une estimation de la distribution des zost\u00e8res \u00e0 partir d'images a\u00e9riennes. Des erreurs peuvent s'\u00eatre produites lors de la classification de l'habitat. Cet ensemble de donn\u00e9es doit \u00eatre utilis\u00e9 \u00e0 des fins non commerciales uniquement.\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Cartes de distribution de lzost\u00e8re obtenues en 2020 avec des drones dans la baie de plaisance, Terre-Neuve\", \"version\": \"1\", \"DOI\": \"10.1139/facets-2022-0149\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioosatlantic.ca/dataset/ca-cioos_f8bd7be3-d4e5-4775-85e9-30dc7e9ae126?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_f8bd7be3-d4e5-4775-85e9-30dc7e9ae126\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"arnault\", \"family\": \"le bris\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2023\", \"09\", \"22\"]}], \"abstract\": \"This dataset contains raster files of eelgrass distribution at three sites (Swift Current, North Harbour, and Bay de L\u2019Eau) in Placentia Bay, Newfoundland. This dataset was collected in the summer and falls 2020 and published in 2023. The shapefiles were created using the procedure detailed in Prystay et all. 2013: 10.1139/facets-2022-0149. First, aerial images of eelgrass beds were collected using drone and a systematic survey design. Images were then combined to create orthomoisaics. Finally, orthomosaics were analyzed using an automatic classification method to distinguished eelgrass from other substrate type (sediment, seaweed). Classification was informed and validated using validation points. It is important to understand that the raster files are estimation of eelgrass distribution from aerial images. Errors may have occurred during the habitat classification. This dataset is to be used for noncommercial purposes only.\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Maps of eelgrass (Zostera marina) collected using drone in Placentia Bay, Newfoundland in 2020\", \"version\": \"1\", \"DOI\": \"10.1139/facets-2022-0149\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioosatlantic.ca/dataset/ca-cioos_f8bd7be3-d4e5-4775-85e9-30dc7e9ae126?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>This dataset contains raster files of eelgrass distribution at three sites (Swift Current, North Harbour, and Bay de L‚ÄôEau) in Placentia Bay, Newfoundland. This dataset was collected in the summer and falls 2020 and published in 2023. The shapefiles were created using the procedure detailed in Prystay et all. 2013: 10.1139/facets-2022-0149. First, aerial images of eelgrass beds were collected using drone and a systematic survey design. Images were then combined to create orthomoisaics. Finally, orthomosaics were analyzed using an automatic classification method to distinguished eelgrass from other substrate type (sediment, seaweed). Classification was informed and validated using validation points. It is important to understand that the raster files are estimation of eelgrass distribution from aerial images. Errors may have occurred during the habitat classification. This dataset is to be used for noncommercial purposes only.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">Ce jeu de donn√©es contient des rasters de la distribution de zost√®re √† trois sites (Swift Current, North Harbour et Bay de L'Eau) dans la baie de Plaisance, √† Terre-Neuve. Ces donn√©es ont √©t√© recueilli √† l'√©t√© et √† l'automne 2020 et publi√© en 2023. Les shapefiles ont √©t√© cr√©√©s en utilisant la proc√©dure d√©taill√©e dans Prystay et all. 2013 : 10.1139/facettes-2022-0149. Les images a√©riennes des herbiers de zost√®res ont √©t√© recueillies √† l'aide d'un drone et d'un plan de relev√© syst√©matique. Les images ont ensuite √©t√© combin√©es pour cr√©er des orthomosa√Øques. Enfin, les orthomosa√Øques ont √©t√© analys√©es √† l'aide d'une m√©thode de classification automatique pour distinguer la zost√®re marine des autres types de substrat (s√©diments, algues). La classification a √©t√© inform√©e et valid√©e √† l'aide de points de validation. Il est important de comprendre que les raster sont une estimation de la distribution des zost√®res √† partir d'images a√©riennes. Des erreurs peuvent s'√™tre produites lors de la classification de l'habitat. Cet ensemble de donn√©es doit √™tre utilis√© √† des fins non commerciales uniquement.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>

notes: This dataset contains raster files of eelgrass distribution at three sites (Swift Current, North Harbour, and Bay de L‚ÄôEau) in Placentia Bay, Newfoundland. This dataset was collected in the summer and falls 2020 and published in 2023. The shapefiles were created using the procedure detailed in Prystay et all. 2013: 10.1139/facets-2022-0149. First, aerial images of eelgrass beds were collected using drone and a systematic survey design. Images were then combined to create orthomoisaics. Finally, orthomosaics were analyzed using an automatic classification method to distinguished eelgrass from other substrate type (sediment, seaweed). Classification was informed and validated using validation points. It is important to understand that the raster files are estimation of eelgrass distribution from aerial images. Errors may have occurred during the habitat classification. This dataset is to be used for noncommercial purposes only.

description_translated.fr:
CIOOS-Atlantic est un consortium d‚Äôinstitutions partenaires engag√©es dans le d√©veloppement de la gestion et la diffusion des donn√©es oc√©anographiques de la c√¥te Atlantique, du Labrador √† la fronti√®re entre le Maine et le Nouveau-Brunswick.

description_translated.en:
CIOOS-Atlantic is a consortium of partner institutions which are committed to the development of a data management and dissemination approach for oceanographic data from the Atlantic Seaboard, a region spanning from Labrador to the Maine / New Brunswick border.

Meaningful engagement and ongoing communication with a broad variety of stakeholders is an integral component of CIOOS-Atlantic, and we will work to meet the needs of the local oceanographic community and ensure regional interests are represented at the national level. Emphasis is placed on the creation of a system which promotes easy data access and supports the work of partners, researchers, industry, and more.
